price: 8. comme faveur et bienfait émanant d’Allah. Allah est Omniscient et Sage.
arabic: فَضۡلٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَنِعۡمَةٗۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: faḍlan mina al-lahi waniʿ'matan wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
